keyMappings:
unmapAll

map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map d scrollPageDown
map u scrollPageUp
map D scrollFullPageDown
map U scrollFullPageUp
map h scrollLeft
map l scrollRight
map 0 scrollToLeft
map $ scrollToRight

map v enterVisualMode
map V enterVisualLineMode

map wk passNextKey

map r reload
map R reload hard
map yy copyCurrentUrl
map p openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map P openCopiedUrlInNewTab

map gu goUp
map gr goToRoot

map I enterInsertMode

map ii focusInput

map f LinkHints.activateMode
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map gf LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map af LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map if LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
map yf LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl

map o Vomnibar.activate
map O Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map B Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map e Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map E Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind

map H goBack
map L goForward

map T createTab
map it createTab incognito
map yt duplicateTab
map J previousTab
map K nextTab
map gp visitPreviousTab
map g0 firstTab
map g$ lastTab
map m toggleMuteTab
map M toggleMuteTab all
map x removeTab
map X restoreTab
map gw moveTabToNewWindow
map gx0 closeTabsOnLeft
map gx$ closeTabsOnRight
map gxa closeOtherTabs
map < moveTabLeft
map > moveTabRight

map s toggleViewSource
map ? showHelp
searchEngines:
a: https://www.amazon.it/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
m: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
r: https://old.reddit.com/r/%s Reddit
s: https://www.google.com/search?q=site:stackoverflow.com%20%s StackOverflow
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s YouTube
